sentence.Network_en: Psychic Chirurgery. You repair psychic damage and impart knowledge of new powers.
sentence.Network_cn: 心灵手术: 你修补精神伤害并可传授新异能的知识.

sentence.Network_en: Can you perform psychic chirurgery on yourself? What would the effects be?
sentence.Network_cn: 你能对自己进行“心灵手术”么? 效果 如何 ?

sentence.Network_en: You can remove such effects by performing psychic chirurgery on yourself.
sentence.Network_cn: 你可以对自己进行“心灵手术”以移除该效果.
